title: Not receiving Google Sign in Prompt and Notification Pixel 3 XL
content: Trying to set up Google 2 factor authentication. When I log in to Google from my desktop, the desktop says I will get a pop up screen on my phone to confirm the sign in, but the screen never appears on the phone even though I am connected to WiFi
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
